title: Related recalls
text_content:
coli O157:H7 2019-09-25_r13230 - Ryding-Regency Meat Packers Ltd
 brand beef and veal products recalled due to E
 coli O157:H7 2019-09-24_r13228 - Ryding-Regency Meat Packers Ltd
 brand Beef Cheek Meat Less Than 5% Water Retention recalled due to E
 coli O157:H7 2019-09-21 - Alpha Meat Packers Ltd
 brand ground beef, ground pork and burger products recalled due to E
 coli O157:H7 2019-09-20_r13221 - Alpha Meat Packers Ltd
 brand Beef Burgers and Lean Ground Beef recalled due to E
 coli O157:H7
question: What products were recalled due to E. coli O157:H7?
answer: Ryding-Regency Meat Packers Ltd brand beef and veal products, Ryding-Regency Meat Packers Ltd brand Beef Cheek Meat Less Than 5% Water Retention, Alpha Meat Packers Ltd brand ground beef, ground pork and burger products, and Alpha Meat Packers Ltd brand Beef Burgers and Lean Ground Beef were recalled due to E. coli O157:H7.
